text: 2018 Italian Athletics Indoor Championships was the 49th edition of the Italian Athletics Indoor Championships and were held in Ancona. ==Champions== {| class="wikitable" width=70% style="font-size:90%; text-align:center;" |- !Event !!Men !!Performance !!Women !!Performance |- |align=left|60 m |align=left| Michael Tumi || 6.70 |align=left| Anna Bongiorni || 7.27 |- |align=left|400 m |align=left| Vladimir Aceti || 46.95 |align=left| Raphaela Boaheng Lukudo || 53.08 |- |align=left|800 m |align=left| Simone Barontini || 1:49.99 |align=left| Elena Bellò || 2:05.3 |- |align=left|1500 m |align=left|Yassin Bouih || 3:44.19 |align=left|Margherita Magnani || 4:17.11 |- |align=left|3000 m |align=left| Yassin Bouih || 8:17.99 |align=left| Margherita Magnani || 9:15.90 |- |align=left|60 m hs |align=left|Hassane Fofana || 7.66 |align=left|Veronica Borsi || 8.19 |- |align=left|5000/3000 m race walk |align=left|Francesco Fortunato || 18:55.26 |align=left|Antonella Palmisano || 11:55.30 |- |align=left|Long jump |align=left|Antonino Trio || 7.88 m |align=left|Tania Vicenzino || 6.52 m |- |align=left|Triple jump |align=left| Fabrizio Donato || 16.94 m |align=left| Ottavia Cestonaro || 13.47 m |- |align=left|High jump |align=left| Stefano Sottile || 2.24 m |align=left| Alessia Trost || 1.90 m |- |align=left|Pole vault |align=left|Claudio Stecchi ||5.55 m |align=left|Roberta Bruni|| 4.35 m |- |align=left|Shot put |align=left| Leonardo Fabbri || 19.17 m |align=left| Chiara Rosa || 16.71 m |} ==References== ==See also== *2017 Italian Athletics Championships ==External links== * All results at FIDAL web site Italian Athletics Championships Athletics Category:Italian Athletics Indoor Championships
